about_the_game:
FRIGID IS A SURVIVAL EXPLORATION EXPERIENCE
Inspired by the Thing movies. Set in the Canadian arctic region where a cataclysmic event puts you in a desperate fight to survive nature. Climate researchers studying the contamination of arctic glaciers have found something disturbing in the area. Your job is to unravel the mystery of an infection spreading among the local wildlife and survive the ordeal.

FEATURES


  • SCAVENGE, CRAFT, BUILD ITEMS TAILORED TO ARCTIC EXPERIENCE
  • SINGLE PLAYER CAMPAIGN INTRIGUING STORY WITH EMOTIONAL SURVIVORS
  • SURVIVAL EXPLORATION
  • INFECTED ANIMALS
  • PHYSICS INTERACTION
  • ATMOSPHERIC GRAPHICS

EXPLORATION

Play in a semi-open world environment as a retired hunter going on winter vacation. Explore every inch of this beautiful wildlife arctic environment.

SURVIVAL MECHANICS/CRAFTING

Build tools, weapons, and shelter to navigate, hunt, and provide protection.

Scavenge anything you can find to aid your survival. Use your creativity to put together and craft unique items tailored to the brutal arctic environment.

INFECTED WILDLIFE

Survive and investigate deadly infected wildlife or find hope in survivors.

TOOLS AND WEAPONS

Find useful items to help you survive
  • CLIMBING ICE PICK AXE

  • FLARE GUNS AND TORCHES
  • BOW AND ARROWS
  • SHOTGUN
  • HOME MADE SPEARS
  • HUNTERS RIFLE

REALISTIC ATMOSPHERIC GRAPHICS

Experience an ultra-realistic beautiful but harsh northern arctic environment.
Travel three distinct vast locations and do what ever it takes to ultimately survive.
  • DAY AND NIGHT ENVIRONMENTS

name: FRIGID VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-7700HQ 2.80Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 8GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
  • Additional Notes: Requires VR Headset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3700X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2070 8GB
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires VR Headset

short_description: Hunt, build, craft and survive an apocalyptic arctic environment and unravel the mystery of a strange virus that is infecting the local wildlife. Inspired by The Thing!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
